name: ELMIA
description: Nostalgic as well as new! Warp action game! A fairy "El" and a forest girl "Mia" living in a village Run through exhilarating warp to save villagers! A fantastic world view like a picture book and beautiful 3D graphics, Enjoy your imagination and enjoy with the beautiful sound that you listen carefully.
minimum_requirements: OS: WindowsVista/7/8/10 Processor: Intel Core i5-3230M or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 720M or better DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Controller recommended
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows10 Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 4 GB available space Additional Notes: Controller recommended
